content: That's really helpful! I think I'll look into the Aqua Globe or Lechuza self-watering planters. I also need to tackle the clutter on my desk, which has been accumulating for months. There are stacks of papers to sort through, and I need to organize my desk drawers. It's going to be a big task, but I'm hoping to get to it this weekend. Do you have any tips on how to approach decluttering a messy desk?
